affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
notes:
This ability interrupts channeling.
Pulls units over 0.5 seconds before dealing damage.
Doesn't pull invulnerable units.
Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.
cmb:
100/130/160/190
28
lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
name: dark_seer_vacuum

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Heroes
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
notes:
Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals.
Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.
If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.
cmb:
70/90/110/130
9
lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
name: dark_seer_ion_shell

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.
notes: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.
cmb:
20/30/40/50
12/11/10/9
lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
name: dark_seer_surge

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Raises a wall of warping light that damages and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Doesn't create illusions from other illusions, or Meepo clones.
Creates a wall 1000 units long, perpendicular to the line between Dark Seer and the target point.
attrib:
WALL DAMAGE: 150/150/150
WALL DURATION: 45
REPLICA DAMAGE: 60%/75%/90%
REPLICA DAMAGE TAKEN: 400%/400%/400%
CAST RANGE: 500/900/1300
SCEPTER REPLICA DAMAGE: 100%/120%/140%
cmb:
125/250/375
100
lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
name: dark_seer_wall_of_replica
